### Manufacturing and Installation of a Soundproofed and Ventilated Cabin

**Procurement Number:** 24-58071
**Publication Date:** July 2, 2024
**Closing Date and Time:** July 30, 2024 (2:00 pm EDT)
**Amendment Number:** 2
**Type of Contract:** Competitive Inquiry
**Procurement Method:** Open Tenders

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) is seeking a contractor to manufacture and install a soundproofed and ventilated cabin to accommodate its analytical instrument.

**Scope of Work:**

* Production of technical drawings
* Fabrication of the cabin
* Delivery of all materials, including necessary hardware
* Installation of the cabin
* Project management of the installation

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* Lowest evaluated price

**Tender Requirements:**

* A non-mandatory site visit will be held on July 15, 2024
* Tenderers must submit their proposal by July 30, 2024 (2:00 pm EDT) to [contracts-template-nationalresearchcouncil-tendersendorsements-CANADA@fedusc.nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:contracts-template-nationalresearchcouncil-tendersendorsements-CANADA@fedusc.nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)
* Contract documents are available for download on the [Canada Buy and Sell website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities)
* Tenderers must comply with the requirements of the bid solicitation and meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive

**Important Information:**

* Canada has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada
* The National Research Council of Canada has adopted the Indigenous Procurement Strategy
